Choose The New Face of Beau’s Beer Caps

16 May 2011

Last month at The Brewer’s Plate, a fundraising event for Not Far From the Tree, Barry and I went head to head to win an auction item–our face on 100,000 bottles of Beau’s Beer All Natural Lager.

Barry was ultimately declared winner of the auction. So his face will soon be featured at an LCBO near you.

The first step in this process is selecting an image to send to Beau’s. Â We’ve done a few head shots. Curious what you think.

Which photo should Barry use for the Beau’s Beer Bottle Cap? I’m leaning toward Photo #2. Take the Poll.
